activities: The following is a general description of how Ashland Inc. and its controlled U.S. subsidiaries and affiliates, ("Ashland"), use personal information obtained from the EU, EEA, and Switzerland ("Personal Information"): (1) Ashland uses Personal Information pertaining to present and former personnel of Ashland in connection with the management and operation of Ashland, making services and benefits available to such personnel, and maintaining contact with former personnel;(2)Ashland uses Personal Information obtained from contractors for the purposes of administering the contractor relationship and the operation of our business interests; (3) Ashland uses Personal Information from vendors and representatives of vendor companies for the purposes of managing the acquisition of goods or services and the contractual relationship with Ashland or any of its affiliates; (4) Ashland uses Personal Information obtained from or relating to prospective and current clients of Ashland and their personnel to provide and offer goods and services to such clients and prospects and to fulfill its obligations pertaining to such goods and services;(5) To a limited extent, Ashland may use Personal Information pertaining to members of the general public for the purpose of making certain information resources available to such persons.
